text: Mikhail Innokentyevich Semyonov ( 26 November 1938 â€“ 18 October 2019) was a Russian politician. He was born in Nukutsky District, Irkutsk Oblast, Soviet Union. He was the Chairman of the People's Khural of the Republic of Buryatia from 21 July 1994 through 23 June 2002. Semyonov died in Ulan-Ude, Buryatia, Russia on 18 October 2019, from a long illness at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Irkutsk Oblast
title: Mikhail Innokentyevich Semyonov
